entry.title: Feminism & Functional Programming: When Paradigms Shift
entry.summary:
Description

Today, developers play a bigger role than ever in shaping culture. Often, those who don’t identify with the people who create a culture, don’t have power within that culture. This is why diversity in tech is so important. I’ll talk about controversial topics like feminism & functional …
entry.content:
Description

Today, developers play a bigger role than ever in shaping culture. Often, those who don’t identify with the people who create a culture, don’t have power within that culture. This is why diversity in tech is so important. I’ll talk about controversial topics like feminism & functional programming…
